title: Crypto-Christ Frequency - GrimGriz/HeroLFG  (Unedited)
description:
I saw an angle for Gavin's Open-Source Email Filter to fit in with the Hive blog Crypto stuff and hit him up to talk about it. Here's the hot fresh mind butter before processing. 

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
